title: EYL #186 Humble Lukanga on Building a Top Financial Firm, & Escaping Genocide in Africa
itunes:title: EYL #186 Humble Lukanga on Building a Top Financial Firm, & Escaping Genocide in Africa
description:
We sat down with one of the top wealth managers in the world, Humble Lukanga. The list of celebrity clients reads as a who's who in the world of sports and entertainment. Issa Rae, Charlemagne tha God, and Lonzo Ball are a few of the clients that his wealth management firm represents. 

His story of overcoming tragedy and genocide in his homeland of Uganda is one of the most inspirational stories you'll ever hear. In episode he walked us through his amazing journey and gave us insight into the world of running a top wealth management firm. #HumbleLukanga #wealth #financialplanning 

EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com

Link for InvestFest: https://investfest.com/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
